attributes.action: Implement Capital punishment for Murder, Rape and paedophilia
attributes.additional_details:
We British citizens have had enough of despicable criminals being allowed to take our tax money, when they have ruined multiple lives. 

we want to make sure these people will never be allowed to walk British streets again, and ensure that proper justice is delivered for victims and their families, why should they live in prison for the rest of their lives, funded by British taxpayers, for the rest of their lives? 

its cheaper and more morally acceptable to execute them instead.
attributes.background: Advocate for the Reintroduction of capital punishment for the heinous crimes like Murder, rape, and paedophilia to uphold justice.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions:

Abolish whole life orders and reintroduce the death penalty: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700357

Bring back capital punishment for the rape of a child: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711979

Hold a referendum on restoring the Death Penalty for murder: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709623
